title: Holy Lag Moly
body:
Ok so I've never experienced this much lag. I hop on a game (op.gg open) and then its fine till like 15 minutes and i start getting a solid 6 fps. I know its on riot's side because my ping is at 50 (like normal) so what is up? Also bought RP and its been like 6 or 7 hours since I've gotten it (charged to my account) *edit* also all graphics settings on LOWEST and no sound
and no windows open whatsoever

replies.body:
FPS Issues can be caused by a number of different things, however, the most common causes are driver or hardware issues. I recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure the most common solutions have been tried.

Let me know if this caused any change.
